name: Acceptance Criteria - F92 Mesh installed in accordance with Standard Drawings.
Acceptance Criteria - Concrete used to construct pits is 25 MPa concrete as per Standard Drawings and specification.
Acceptance Criteria - Galvanised steel or plastic-coated steel step irons installed in pits greater than 1 meter in depth.
Acceptance Criteria - Correct pit lid class in accordance with Standard Drawings and specification.
Acceptance Criteria - Bedding depth at least 100mm, Bedding class 3 crushed rock.
Acceptance Criteria - Socket ends of pipe section facing upstream and fully entered. Rubber ring correctly set.
Acceptance Criteria - Class 3 Crushed Rock backfill used at detailed on long sections.
○ Minimum testing frequency of 20% of all LOTS.
○ LOT is defined as from one pit to another for each layer. Typically, 1 LOT between each pit assuming 1m depth of backfill.
Acceptance Criteria - Inspection and acceptance of finished pits and pipes.
